body.name: Wolf Essentials Adult Cozy Soft Microfiber Neck Pillow, Compact, Perfect for Plane or Car Travel, Charcoal

features: PREMIUM COMFORT-Our luxurious crystal fleece neck pillow cover and super soft fiber filling will keep you cozy no matter where your nap happens. Our neck pillow offers perfect support that will keep your head, neck & shoulders from feeling fatigued.

VERSATILE – This travel pillow can provide extra support to protect the neck from pain when you are traveling by airplane, car, train, or bus. It can also be ideal for home when watching Netflix or reading on your favorite comfortable chair.

LIFE PROOF - Life can get messy, no worries here. Our travel pillows are durable and easy to clean! Just toss in the wash with like colors in warm water (Yes, the whole thing, no need to remove the filling.) No bleach. Tumble dry on low heat. Do not iron.

GREEN IS GOOD - We strive to preserve our planet for the next generation of travelers. By using fibers for our neck travel pillow, filling and minimal packaging that is made from at least 80% post-consumer content, we help play our part in protecting the environment.

COMPACT WITH SNAP CLOSURE - The perfect size for getting cozy at home or on the go. Easy to bring along on trips without sacrificing all your luggage space. Conveniently snap it around luggage, purses, backpacks, or anything you find appropriate.
body.description: World’s Best’s Signature Travel Pillow offers superior neck support and ultra-plush comfort. Filled with feather-soft microfiber, this pillow offers a hypoallergenic and machine washable alternative to down-filled pillows. Perfect for travel, lounging at home, or therapeutic neck support. Environmentally friendly fill and packaging.World’s Best...Your First-Class Comfort Experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Wolf Manufacturing Company is a Texas-based manufacturer/importer of fine sewn products ranging from neck pillows, travel pillows, travel blankets, fleece throws, stadium blankets, and other quality items to make traveling easier and more pleasant. World’s Best Travel Pillow Your First-Class Comfort Experience World’s Travel Pillow offers superior neck support and ultra-plush comfort. Filled with feather-soft microfiber, this pillow offers a hypoallergenic and machine washable alternative to down-filled pillows. Perfect for travel, lounging at home, or therapeutic neck support. Feather-soft microfibers wrapped in soft-plush fabric for the ultimate in travel comfort Perfect hypoallergenic alternative to down-filled pillows Machine washable. Guaranteed to be as soft each and every time you use it We use recycled materials like water bottles which are transformed into our soft micro-fiber filling Filled and finished in the USA

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ultimate Comfort Solution: Neck Pillow Transforms Airplane Relaxation!
reviews.reviewText: TLDR: Gifted my spouse this neck pillow post our Asia trip. Essential for home and travel. Bought extras for each room.After our lengthy journey back from Asia, which included a taxing 20-hour combination of flights and airport layovers, I decided to surprise my spouse with this neck pillow for the holidays. Despite never having used one before, my spouse has been overjoyed with it. It has become a constant presence in our daily life, offering relief while reading in bed, working at the desk, or lounging during movie nights. It's a rare sight to see them this pleased with a gift. Due to its success, I've gone ahead and purchased several more, ensuring we have one in every key area of our house, and I'm planning to get another one to keep exclusively with our travel gear. Its plush comfort is truly a standout feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flying With Ease and Zero Neck Pain
reviews.reviewText: These neck pillows redefine travel comfort! The memory foam molds seamlessly to your neck, providing unparalleled support. The breathable, plush cover adds a touch of luxury, and the snap closure ensures easy portability. Whether on a plane or relaxing at home, these pillows are a game-changer for neck relief. A travel essential I wouldn't go without, especially on cross country flights!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I Ordered and Compared 6 Different Pillows So You Don't Have To
reviews.reviewText: Points in each review: Overall, Fabric, Filling, Washability, Button or string, Bag (does it have one), Loop (does it have one, and if it does, size/material), Other (if advertised as Hypoallergenic, if any part advertised as made in USA, if anything comes with it)napfun Travel Pillow - 3/10Overall: Shaped to be very low, so doesn't provide much support for the head (which is the entire reason for the pillow...), strings also don't make this tight enough/close enough to neck to provide support even if it were taller.Fabric: No-hair, smooth-ish/not bad, not greatFilling: memory foam (plush)Washability: cover removable and washable, filling unknownButton or string: strings with interlocking cordlocks. For me, these are less preferable than the button because they're an extra dangly thing, they are more difficult to undo, and they feel like they don't keep the front as close together so the pillow is not as snug around neck as I want. I suppose this would b good if you have a huge neck. (Exactly the same as the Saireider and the TALLGO)Bag: yesLoop: no"Travel Pillow, Best Memory Foam Neck Pillow Head Support Soft Pillow" (TALLGO brand, no brand anywhere on packaging) - 4/10Overall: is tall enough to provide support, and extra tall on the back which I kinda like (prevent head from rolling when the plane turns), but even with the string as tight as possible, it still feels too loose around neck, filling not that soft/givingFabric: half short-haired/soft, the inside where the neck touches is no-hair/smooth but still nice/soft on skinFilling: memory foam (tho not the plush kind)Washability: cover removable and washable, filling unknownButton or string: strings with interlocking cordlocks. For me, these are less preferable than the button because they're an extra dangly thing, they are more difficult to undo, and they feel like they don't keep the front as close together so the pillow is not as snug around neck as I want. I suppose this would b good if you have a huge neck. (Exactly the same as the Saireider and the NapFun)Bag: yesLoop: noTravelmate Memory Foam Neck Pillow - 5/10Overall: shape is nice, filling comforable, but since there's no button OR string so it's very loose and the fabric is not comfortableFabric: NOT soft/comfortableFilling: memory foam (plush)Washability: cover removable and washable, filling unknownButton or string: noBag: noLoop: large elastic loop, no button, able to fit over both handles of a carry-onSAIREIDER Neck Pillows - 6/10Overall: shape is taller than average which is nice for support, filling is forgiving, fabric good, strings still make it not tight enough around neckFabric: medium-length haired (not bad, but I still prefer the short-haired or no-hair/smooth cuz when shifting positions, hair will resist slightly)Filling: memory foam (not plush)Washability: cover removable and washable, filling unknownButton or string: strings with interlocking cordlocks. For me, these are less preferable than the button because they're an extra dangly thing, they are more difficult to undo, and they feel like they don't keep the front as close together so the pillow is not as snug around neck as I want. I suppose this would b good if you have a huge neck. (Exactly the same as the TALLGO and the NapFun)Bag: yesLoop: noOther: comes with one pair of 3M earplugs and a nice plastic earplug holder and a very nice eye/sleep mask (soft fabric, nice space for nose)Wolf Essentials Adult Cozy Soft Microfiber Neck Pillow ("World's Best" as brand on label) - 7/10Overall: Only one advertised "washable" (which I assume includes filling), only one advertised hypoallergenic, only one advertised that has any part made in the USA (see Other). Comfort is good. Fabric is nice, filling forgiving enough but strong enough to give support, shaped to be tight enough around neck...just wish there was a loop and bag...Fabric: soft, but long-haired (so when you rub against it, it briefly pushes against you, so mildly uncomfortable when shifting position),Filling: memory foam (normal, not plush)Washability: cover removable, entire thing is washableButton or string: buttonBag: noLoop: noOther: "Shell made in China, filled and finished in USA", "Hypoallergenic"Fabuday Memory Foam Travel Pillows - 8/10Overall: Excellent. Filling is NICE and cushiony, fabric soft, shape close to neck. If this had a bag, it'd be a 10/10.Fabric: very soft but not long-haired, excellentFilling: memory foam (extra plush)Washability: cover removable and washable, filling unknownButton or string: buttonBag: noLoop: small, durable (thick canvas material) loop with button, 8.5" when full length/unbuttoned, good for wrist

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is very nice. Though as I have a very short neck I had to take almost half of the stuffing out. The brown hair like stuffing is very soft and I put it in a zip lock bag and saved it. I do not understand why some feel the need to complain about the stuffing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Newly Pierced Ears
reviews.reviewText: I got this for sleeping on my side after new ear piercings--it's been a lifesaver. My ear fits nicely inside the hole and the pillow provides support for the rest of my head. The pillow is a bit firm, but I understand that's probably helpful for it's intended purpose of holding your head up while in a more vertical position. The exterior lining is soft and fuzzy. I've washed this pillow multiple times now on gentle cycle, and it's holding up well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Better than nothing
reviews.reviewText: I didn't have high expectations given the price point of this neck pillow, and my expectations were met.Flying is uncomfortable no matter what, here are the pros and cons of my experience:Pros:- This pillow does make it slightly more comfortable due to the support at the back of your neck although it does take some getting used to.- The snap closure helps to connect the pillow to your bag while it is out and not in need.- It does provide support and helped me sleep on a relatively short flight.- Helped keep my head from going in odd directions which causes the old pain in the neck.- Overnight delivery.Cons:- At first, it felt WAY too thick and made my neck hurt but after a while I got used to it. I’d say it was uncomfortable until I adjusted to it.- It was too small to snap while wearing (size 17 neck) but was fine unsnapped.- A frequent flyer should be looking for a better option, but that should be a given.Overall, not a perfect solution but if you’re in need of something quick and cheap, this is a good option for a budget neck pillow. I needed one overnight so my options were limited and I don’t fly much so I wasn't looking to make an investment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect neck pillow.
reviews.reviewText: Nice firm yet plush/soft neck pillow. Offers a lot of comfortable support. Love that it snaps together to be able to clip it to your travel bag, or to secure it around your neck. Also it is machine washable and can go in the dryer. Love that it is manufactured in TX.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and supportive
reviews.reviewText: Nice fabric and very comfortable foam that cushions well and holds up. So glad it is NOT memory foam. I like the snap which makes it easy to hang from my backpack.
